epic_title: Secure Authentication and Multi-Factor Access Control
title: Implement secure login system with multi-factor authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is protected against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Incorporate data encryption, secure session handling, and industry-compliant password policies.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using a password and an additional verification factor.
System enforces strong password policies and encrypts session data.
test_cases: Given a registered user, when the user attempts to log in using the correct password and OTP, then they should be successfully authenticated.
Given an invalid login attempt, when the password or OTP is incorrect, then the system should deny access.

title: Design a responsive interface for all devices
description: As a user, I want the web interface to be responsive, so that I can access it easily on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure the interface is compliant with accessibility standards and usability best practices.
acceptance_criteria: Interface adjusts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
All accessibility features are implemented as per standards.
test_cases: Given any device, when a user accesses the interface, then it should adjust to fit the device screen properly.
Given any user, when the user navigates through the interface, then it should meet accessibility standards ensuring ease of use.

title: Develop a personalized dashboard for user engagement
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I see relevant information and actions based on my profile.
attributes_and_rules: Show account summaries, recommended services, and alerts tailored to the user.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays data relevant to the user’s profile.
Real-time updates and personalized shortcuts are available on the dashboard.
test_cases: Given a customer, when the customer logs in, then the dashboard should show personalized account information.
Given an update to the user’s profile, when the user accesses the dashboard, then the displayed data should reflect the latest updates.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Implement digital workflows for account openings and service requests
description: As a customer, I want to open accounts and submit service requests digitally, so that I can complete these tasks conveniently online.
attributes_and_rules: Include step-by-step guidance, validations, and approval checkpoints.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can submit account openings and service requests online.
The system validates inputs and routes requests for approvals as needed.
test_cases: Given a new customer, when they submit an account opening request, then the system should validate and route the request for approval.
Given an open service request, when the customer completes the required steps, then the system should update the status and proceed to the next process.

title: Develop real-time notifications and email updates
description: As a user, I want to receive real-time notifications and email updates, so that I am informed about the status of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Integrate in-app and email alerts for key workflow events.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive real-time notifications and email updates for submissions, approvals, and rejections.
Notifications are clear and informative.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, when the status changes, then the user should receive an in-app notification.
Given a user’s request is approved, when the approval is processed, then the user should receive an email notification.

title: Implement secure document upload and verification
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload required documents, so that my service requests can be processed.
attributes_and_rules: Validate file formats, enforce encryption, and associate documents with customer records.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can securely upload documents for their requests.
Uploaded documents are encrypted and associated with the correct user records.
test_cases: Given a document upload request, when the user submits a valid file, then the document should be securely stored and linked to the user’s record.
Given an invalid file format, when the user attempts to upload the file, then the system should reject the upload.

title: Implement save and resume functionality for applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete applications and resume later, so that I can complete them at my convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Support progress indicators, auto-save, and seamless resume.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can save incomplete applications and resume from the same point later.
Applications are auto-saved periodically to prevent data loss.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user saves the progress, then the system should store the application state.
Given a saved application, when the user returns, then the system should allow resuming from the last saved point.

epic_title: User Interaction History and Audit Logs
title: Maintain comprehensive user interaction history and audit logs
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track my previous activities and submissions.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must be tamper-proof and comply with regulatory standards.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view their full interaction history.
Audit logs are tamper-proof and securely stored.
test_cases: Given a user interaction, when the user completes an action, then the interaction should be logged.
Given regulatory requirements, when an audit is requested, then the logs should meet compliance standards.

title: Build integration with core banking systems for real-time data access
description: As a user, I want real-time synchronization between the portal and core banking systems, so that I see up-to-date information.
acceptance_criteria: Portal data is synchronized with the core banking system in real time.
Integration is secure and handles faults gracefully.
test_cases: Given a data update in the core banking system, when the user views the portal, then the data should be up-to-date.
Given an integration fault, when an error occurs, then the system should handle it without compromising security.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Optimization Layer
title: Implement a dedicated and optimized portal database
description: As an administrator, I want a separate database for the portal, so that we ensure performance and independence from core systems.
attributes_and_rules: Include caching, indexing, and asynchronous data synchronization.
acceptance_criteria: Portal has a dedicated database optimized for performance.
Caching and indexing significantly improve response times.
test_cases: Given a separate portal database, when user transactions are performed, then the database should handle the load efficiently.
Given optimization mechanisms, when various operations are executed, then response times should meet performance standards.

title: Implement role-based access control framework
description: As an admin, I want to assign access based on user roles, so that we ensure security and compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Define clear authorization hierarchies and assign permissions appropriately.
acceptance_criteria: Access to the portal is restricted according to user roles.
Permissions are clearly defined and assigned based on authorization levels.
test_cases: Given a user role, when accessing the portal, then the user should have access only to permitted services.
Given new role assignments, when roles and permissions are updated, then the changes should reflect accurately in the system.
